name: Black Label Trading Co. - Viaticum - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Black Label Trading Co. Viaticum this is a true testament to what Black Label Trading Co. Cigars represents: mouth-watering flavors with a perfect balance between strength and complexity. Hand Rolled at La Fabrica Oveja Negra in a box-pressed format, the unique blend is composed of finely aged Nicaraguan and Honduran long-filler tobaccos enclosed in a bold yet ever-so-smooth Ecuadorian Maduro wrapper. Hints of creamy espresso, zesty white pepper, smokey cedar, and fresh dark cocoa are in this medium to full-bodied profile.
